field.name: loai_duyet
field.check: loai_duyet not in (select loai_duyet from dmloaiduyet)

field.name: ma_td
field.check: ma_td not in (select ma_td from dmthaydoi where loai_duyet = #table.loai_duyet and status = '1')⩓exists(select 1 from #table b where @@table.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and @@table.ma_quyen = b.ma_quyen and @@table.u_status = b.u_status and @@table.ma_td = b.ma_td having count(ma_td) > 1)

field.name: u_status
field.check: u_status not in (select u_status from dmttcttg where loai_duyet = #table.loai_duyet and s_status = '9' and status = '1')⩓exists(select 1 from #table b where @@table.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and @@table.ma_quyen = b.ma_quyen and @@table.u_status = b.u_status and @@table.ma_td = b.ma_td having count(u_status) > 1)
